If you’re in the market for a brand new Apple Watch Series 10, iPad mini 7, MacBook Air, or AirTags, you won’t want to miss these great deals available right now.

Apple Watch Series 10 – $329 (down from $399)

Apple Watch Series 10 features an always-on 42mm display, fitness and activity tracking, heart rate monitor, ECG functionality, crash detection, fall detection, Emergency SOS dialing, ovulation tracking, GPS, pinch gesture support, voice control, all day battery life, and water resistance. Why pay full price when you can get it at a $70 discount from $399 down to $329 from Amazon? The deal price is available in a variety colors and bands, so find something you like!

  • Get Apple Watch Series 9 for $329 (down from $399 MSRP)

iPad mini 7 – $399 (down from $499)

iPad mini 7 is a great little tablet with an A17 processor with Apple Intelligence support, 8″ LCD display, 12MP front and rear cameras, 128GB storage, and support for Apple Pencil Pro. From Amazon you can take $100 off the retail price of $499 in any of the color options, and get your new favorite tablet for just $399.

  • iPad mini 7 – $399 (down from $499)

AirTags 4-pack – $70 (down from $99)

AirTag personal trackers are a great way to keep track of your belongings, whether it’s a briefcase, backpack, luggage, pet, bike, car, or nearly anything else you might want to keep an eye on. Typically the 4-pack is $99, but right now Amazon is taking the price down to $69.99.
